I have been playing dead by daylight for almost a year now, I love it. You are seeing bad review after bad review thanks  to a resent update which changed several perks and yes one of them is bugged to an extreme however the devs are aware of it and you shouldnt run into to many people knownly taking advantage of this bug. (its a perk called tinkerer at the second level of the perk the killer looses heartbeat and its supposed to come back after a few seconds however it dose'nt) the changes have made the current play style hard however its like anything else you need to be willing to adapt inorder to play well. people have gotten to use to wasteing their sprintburst or their dead hard. its time people adapted and stop being so salty. that being said I love this game its somthing i can jump into when ive had a bad day or somthing i can do while im bored so pick it up and see you in the fog!

A great game if you're looking for something tense that requires a level of skill on either side of the fence. Not just another form of instant gratification. No guns, no easy easy way out; it's just you and the trial.

In my opinion, Dbd is a great game with a fun concept and pretty neat gameplay; and with the latest patches, it's been getting even better. The community can be pretty toxic at times but don't let some bad apples spoil the bunch. I definetly recommend it ^_^

Dont take the recent reviews seriously. Frikkin survivor mains just got mad at the last patch.

(review edited completely because my last one was shit)

good stuff:
- game very fun as a beginner
- developers are listening, recently making good decisions and improving the game
- frequent updates and additional content
- feels like you get 2 games in 1, survivor gameplay completely different to killer gameplay
- influx of new players recently

bad stuff:
- game gets stale after playing it a lot, not scary as a survivor after the first few games despite technically being a horror game
- community is somewhat bad. worse than a lot of multiplayer games, better than competitive games like cs:go/overwatch etc.. it has improved though
- some core mechanics are boring (e.g doing generators, you just hold mouse1 and have skillchecks every so often)
- some killers are almost useless the higher the rank you are, need balancing (they have been improving balance however)

This is my review. Please like and subscribe if you agree.

I love the game mechanics, and has original ideas.
I see that as the game grows there is a slight people who didnt recommend the game at the end of june and july 2018.
Many people cannot adapt to this game as the game genre itself is not a mainstream genre. My friend bought the game and play only 3 games because he was hooked straight after loading and cannot cope up with the killer skill.
My suggestion is:
As there is a growth in quantity, dev should add bot games so that the new players can cope with the current player that knows the mechanic already. 
About the community, 
Its more toxic than the first year of the game, people keep being angry for getting hook or camped by the killer.
But overall, i like both the game mode, killers and survivor. These mode has their own sensation, while u r playing survivor u will feel intense and vice versa.

I have played 3 games tonight and each game was worthless because the killer was teamed with a survivor.  The rate this is happening is increasing.  How they do it is by requeing until the killer's game lobby shows their friend's screenname.  I've pointed this out on the forums and nothing has been addressed.  The developers need to remove the screen names from the lobby so the killer cannot identify their friend.  The game is ruined.  Do not buy this game because of cheaters.

I really only play this game because my friends play it and I want to play with the boys you know. But personally I dont find this game fun (Mainly because im bad) and not really planing on getting better.

This game is super fun the community on the other hand is a bit rough. The gameplay is solid and the devs do their best to keep the game as even as they can. Most of the people that play this game are laid back but there are a few that take this game super serious and say some of the meanest things. Although I don't think most of them really mean what they say its more from the frustation of losing i guess. Over all this game is great would recommend to anybody and especiallyanybody that has friends that could join along the survivewith your friends make it 10x more fun.

BEFORE YOU BUY THIS GAME!  It is extremely important that you know one VERY IMPORTANT THING!, if your gonna play survivor you CANNOT expect to survive every game! You might end up dying first or last among a group not so skilled for various reasons! and if you decide to play killer you CANNOT expect to kill all 4 survivors!  You may get just 1 sometimes or none and you will run into teabagers and experienced people! But Dont let this get you down or upset! I started playing a few days ago and I still am working to become better and stronger and this game is defenetly one your gonna suck at first for the beginning half until you learn how to play and get better! Aside from that I absolutely love this game and it has given me somthing different to do and try! Its got a bunch of old horror characters and im getting better at using the trapper (he was my 2nd weakest I think to play its just difficult for preplanning with bear traps XD) any ways I recmend it very much I say defenetly worth the money i spent for the game plus dlc for extra giggles and more variety I give this game, 2 hatchets, 1 bear trap, a hammer and a spiky stick!

Theres a lot of salt about the recent update, leading to the reviews becoming mixed. This is probably one of the best updates the game has had, as it updated old perks and buffed two of the weaker killers(Hag and Trapper) with a mix of buffs and QoL changes. Recent patches have also removed or made harder some of the more uninteractive mechanics from the survivors side (i.e. vacuum pallets, flashlight saves). This has led to a lot of salt.
Game and recent changes are great tho, 10/10 would step in just rearmed trap again.
Every time the killer looks deep into my eyes I know he's my true love.  I'm just hooked on him, literally.

This game is Was great, however the latest update has made it so easy for killers it is funny. Seeing killers get 4k's all day is not fun and I would not recommend this for anyone that wants to win as a survivor. They made 360's harder, killers easier, and flashlights saves worthless. Bloodlust just makes it even worse, the nurse can chase people even though her ability should be the number one thing she uses. However, now bloodlust makes nurse players even more crazy. Soon, they will nerf the survivor perks such as self heal, but the devs don't nerf killer perks like bbq and nurse's calling.
